article: In America, where labor costs are so high, "do-it-yourself" is a way of life. Many people  _  their own cars, build their own garages, and even rebuild their own houses.  _  many of them will also write their own books. In Hollywood there is a  _  that publishes children's books with the help of computers.  _  other book companies also publish that way, this company is not like the others. It  _  the reader to become the main character with the help of computers. Here is  _  they do it. Let us suppose a child is named Hody. The computer uses this information to make up a story  _  pictures. The story is then printed up. "This book is about me," a child who  _  such a book might say. So the company is called "Me-Books Publishing Company".  _  like me-books because they like to see in print their own names, their pictures, and the names of their friends and their pets. But more  _  , in this way, readers are much more interested in reading the stories. Me-books are helping children to learn how to read.
